data.name: SCARLET NEXUS Pre-Order Bundle
data.detailed_description:
The Pre-Order Bundle is a set of additional content for in-game use.

Content includes:
- Additional Attachment Set "Shoulder Baki (11)"
- Special Battle Attire Set -Sound-
- Additional Attachment "Face Vision Seal"
- Additional Attachment "Dream Catcher"

*Items will be available via the in-game shop after downloading the content.
*You must download the latest update in order to use the content.
data.about_the_game:
The Pre-Order Bundle is a set of additional content for in-game use.

Content includes:
- Additional Attachment Set "Shoulder Baki (11)"
- Special Battle Attire Set -Sound-
- Additional Attachment "Face Vision Seal"
- Additional Attachment "Dream Catcher"

*Items will be available via the in-game shop after downloading the content.
*You must download the latest update in order to use the content.
data.short_description: The Pre-Order Bundle is a set of additional content for in-game use that contains additional attachments and a Special Battle Attire -Audio- costume set.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7970, 3 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K | AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, 4 GB | AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
